DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Asia South Africa . The aim trial compare efficacy safety repaglinide plus insulin NPH ( insulin Neutral Protamine Hagedorn ) insulin NPH alone subject type 2 diabetes inadequately control repaglinide .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Repaglinide Combined With Insulin NPH Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes HbA1c ( glycosylated haemoglobin ) : 713 % ( inclusive ) BMI ( body mass index ) maximum 35 kg/m^2
